ui.kubejs.slashblade: You have not learned the Soul of the Blade.
ui.kubejs.relic_coin: Ancient coins that can be used to synthesize different Vouchers
ui.kubejs.voucher: Fragments from the gaps of the World Bubble, which can be used to trade for different supplies in the task
ui.kubejs.banned_dim: You need to reach chapter 5 to set foot here
ui.kubejs.banned_seed: You have no connection to the item in this Worldline
ui.kubejs.overowrld_item: You can not pick up this item, becaus you have lost the Present Blessing.
ui.kubejs.lumium_coin: Use this item to set the number of your Otherworld Relics slots to 2
ui.kubejs.heart_of_the_deep: Used in combination with Reinforced Echo Shard...
ui.kubejs.reinforced_echo_shard: With the Heart of the Deep in the mainhand and the item in the offhand, a rift will be torn through time and space when used while sneaking ......
ui.kubejs.true_soul_of_light: ⌈Noctuary⌋ All the nights in the world
ui.kubejs.first_aid_kit: ⌈Arknights⌋ You'd better know how it works
ui.kubejs.glase_soda: ⌈Far Away⌋ Original, lemon, salt, grape, snakeweed?
ui.kubejs.white_mask: ⌈Elden Ring⌋ Bloodstained, faintly grinning white mask
ui.kubejs.photo_of_niko:
⌈One Shot⌋ 
Not a cat!
A backup!
3rd time's the charm?
This is kind of fun.
Lookin' Good.
Niko blinked in this one. 
Nice.
Very photogenic.
Can't have too much of a good thing!
The ultimate photo.
ui.kubejs.godricks_great_rune: ⌈Elden Ring⌋ The first demigods were The Elden Lord Godfrey and his offspring, the golden lineage
ui.kubejs.compact_pal_factory_2: Fully self-sufficient Pal Factory after extreme compression
ui.kubejs.compact_pal_factory_3: Generate a random Pokeball every once in a while
ui.kubejs.sages_stone_2: Converts your armor into Attack Damage, but eats up hp every so often
ui.kubejs.glase_soda_2: Provides a small amount of shielding every so often
ui.kubejs.white_mask_2: Provides short duration strength effects every so often
ui.kubejs.true_three_goddess_2: Boosts your attributes based on your move speed
ui.kubejs.old_george_nutritional_puree_2: Boosts your Attack Damage based on your max health
ui.kubejs.miniature_galaxy_2: Convert your Attack Speed to Critical Damage
ui.kubejs.the_necklace_of_krosa_2: Gives you a random effect every once in a while
ui.kubejs.godricks_great_rune_2:
Every once in a while, consume a gold nugget from your offhand 
to make you take significantly less damage for a period of time
ui.kubejs.helium_3_crystal_infinity: Nuclear fuel with slow reaction speed but extremely long reaction time
ui.kubejs.wear_to_update:
Wear this relic to see the updated attributes, 
 this type of relics can not repeatly provide boosts for the same attribute
curios.modifiers.otherworld_relics: When in tune with the relic:
